ARABIC: قَالَ بَل رَّبُّكُمْ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ٱلَّذِى فَطَرَهُنَّ وَأَنَا۠ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰهِدِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'Far from it! Your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, He who brought them into being. I am one of those who bear witness to that.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He said: "In fact it was your Lord, the Lord of the heavens and the earth, who created them; and I bear witness to this.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He said: "Nay, but your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth which He created and to that I bear witness before you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He said, "Your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth. It was He who created them and I testify to this fact".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “In fact, your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, the One Who created them; and I am of those who testify to it.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "Nay, your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, Who created them and to that I am one of the witnesses."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: Nay! your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, Who brought them into existence, and I am of those who bear witness to this:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'Nay, but your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth who originated them, and I am one of those that bear witness thereunto.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: Nay, but your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, Who created them; and I am of those who testify unto that.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Abraham replied, "Your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, who created them, and I bear witness to that.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: Aye! your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth Who created them, and as to that I am of the witnesses.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Indeed, your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, who originated them, and I affirm that.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said, "Nay, your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, He Who created them (from nothing): and I am a witness to this (Truth).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He said: "Nay, your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, Who created them and of that I am one of the witnesses.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: No' he answered, 'your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, the Originator of them, and I am among those bearing witness to it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “Your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, the One who created them, and I bear witness to that.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "[No], rather, your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth who created them, and I, to that, am of those who testify.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:56]   He said, ‘Nay, but your Lord, the [only] One worthy of being worshipped, is the Lord, the Owner, of the heavens and the earth, [the One] Who originated them, [Who] created them without any precedent, and to that, which I have said, I am a witness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Abraham said: (Nay, but your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, Who created them; and I am of those who testify unto that) to what I have said.
